name: .STOP File Extension
summary: Learn about .STOP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Because STOP files have been encrypted by ransomware, they cannot be opened. However, you can attempt to decrypt your STOP files using Emsisoft Decryptor for STOP Djvu. Read the instructions at the program's website carefully before attempting to decrypt your STOP files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
